channel.title: Slides on Ubuntu Korea Community
channel.description: Recent content in Slides on Ubuntu Korea Community

item.title: UbuCon Korea 2024
item.description: Following the success of last year’s UbuCon Korea, UbuCon Korea will be held at Aug 10th at Microsoft Korea. With the theme “Deploy with Ubuntu”

item.title: Ubuntu 24.04
item.description: Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat is the latest LTS version released in April 2024. You can get it today, and run it on various environments such as Desktop, Servers, IoT, Cloud and much more.
